PIT.title: Public Interface Testing â€“ Guides and useful info
PIT.cardText:
This section provides documentation which advises users on:

  • How to register for access to the Public Interface Testing (PIT) environment for the new PAYE Modernisation services
  • How to raise queries or issues arising from either PIT or in relation to our published technical documentation.
  • Supported conformance test scenarios which can be executed in the PIT environment.

cards.link: PIT/PAYE PIT Help Desk User Guide.pdf
cards.description: PAYE PIT Help Desk User Guide

Screens-PIT3.title: PIT Self Service and ROS Payroll Reporting PIT Current Version

cards.explainer: This portal page provides access to both the PIT Self Service and ROS Payroll Reporting applications for the PIT current version environment. The portal page will determine which application to direct a user to based on the provided digital certificate. The same TDM cert can be used for this environment as the one for the PIT next version, but employer certs differ between environments.

cards.description: ROS Payroll Reporting JSON Envelope schema

cards.explainer: CSV is not versioned. The samples and test responses are provided for illustration purposes only. They are not intended for software use as the format is not guaranteed and could change without prior notice. RPNs in a CSV file are not intended for software but rather for those who calculate payroll manually and need a  more human readable format than JSON or XML.

Screens-PIT4.title: PIT Self Service and ROS Payroll Reporting PIT Next Version

cards.explainer: This portal page provides access to both the PIT Self Service and ROS Payroll Reporting applications for the PIT next version environment. The portal page will determine which application to direct a user to based on the provided digital certificate. The same TDM cert can be used for this environment as the one for the PIT current version, but employer certs differ between environments.

cards.description: ROS Payroll Reporting JSON Envelope schema

cards.explainer: CSV is not versioned. The samples and test responses are provided for illustration purposes only. They are not intended for software use as the format is not guaranteed and could change without prior notice. RPNs in a CSV file are not intended for software but rather for those who calculate payroll manually and need a  more human readable format than JSON or XML.
